title: Smart Data Models - Agri Greenhouse
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of the conditions recorded within a generic greenhouse, a type of AgriParcel.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type. It has to be AgriGreenhouse

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

ownedBy.description: Relationship. Owner (Person or Organization) of the AgriGreenhouse

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

belongsTo.description: Relationship. Entity the Greenhouse belongs to

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

hasAgriParcelParent.description: Relationship. Reference to the AgriParcel entity to which this entity relates

hasAgriParcelChildren.description: Relationship. Related sub AgriParcel records to which this entity relates

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

hasWeatherObserved.description: Relationship. Reference to the weather observation record current for this entity

hasWaterQualityObserved.description: Relationship. Reference to one or more water quality observation records current for this entity

relativeHumidity.description:
Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. The inside relative humidity expressed as a number between 0 and 1 representing the range 0% to 100 (%).

0 <= relativeHumidity <= 1

leafTemperature.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Degrees centigrade'. The average greenhouse air temperature nominally in degrees centigrade.

co2.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Units:'mg/L'. The measured interior C02 concentration nominally in mg/L

dailyLight.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Units:'kw/m2'. Daily Accumulated light measured in kW per square metre

drainFlow.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Units:'L/s'. The observed drain flow rate in litres per second

hasDevice.description: Relationship. Model:'http://schema.org/URL'. Reference to the IoT devices associated with this greenhouse i.e. sensors, controls.
